Posts.Content: poodlemom3 wrote: I was diagnosed 3 weeks ago, was to have a lumpectomy on 7/28/10, surgeon advised me, after reading the MRI the day before,  the mass is too large, need to to a mastectomy ... the Dr  first wants me to have BRACA testing .... I am WAITING for the insurance to approve test !! I am so MAD !!!  poodlegirl Dx 7/1/2010, IDC, 6cm+, Stage 0, Grade 2, ER+/PR+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: NEW to all of this ?! poodlemom3 CindyRN
